EU donates urea fertilizer to DPRK
articles.content:
EU donates urea fertilizer to DPRK 
    Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- The European Union donated more than 60,000 tons of urea fertilizer to the DPRK.
 The fertilizer donated by the EU this year as it did last year will help increase the agricultural production.

articles.title: Book on nature of U.S. nuclear racket published
articles.content:
Book on nature of U.S. nuclear racket published 
    Pyongyang, April 22 (KCNA) -- Book "DPRK's withdrawal from NPT is a self-defensive step" written by P. C. Sharma, chairman of the International Study Centre for Juche-Oriented Mass Media in Nepal, was published in Nepal on April 9.
 In the preface the author said that the DPRK's acceding to the NPT was aimed to remove the nuclear threat from the United States, but on the contrary the NPT has been used as a leverage to pose and justify the U.S. nuclear threat to the DPRK.    
 The book, which consists of 8 subtitles, gives a logical exposition of the nature of the U.S. nuclear racket against the DPRK, the unreasonable deed of the International Atomic Energy Agency, the validity of the DPRK's withdrawal from the NPT, etc.
